GapFillDragDrop.Title: Indirect questions
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1. Can you tell me how much this costs?
2. Do you know where the museum is?
3. Can you tell me if there is a bank here?
4. Do you know how far the hotel is ?
5. Can you tell mehow long it takes?
6. Do you know what time the bus leaves?
7. Can you tell us where she is?
8. Do you know where the nearest supermarket is?
9. Can you tell us where the clothes shops are ?
10. Do you know if there is an internet cafe near here?
